title: Motion Infographics Utilization Course for Programming Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Most learners do not own PCs and proceed with learning in a limited tech environment primarily using smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain algorithm design processes using motion infographics.
Learners can solve intermediate-level programming problems involving conditional statements/loops with 80% accuracy.
Learners can express the debugging process through motion infographics and correct logical errors within three attempts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
